entry.title: Armenian officials talk Karabakh negotiations as border commission stalls

media:group.media:title: Armenian officials talk Karabakh negotiations as border commission stalls
media:group.media:description:
Foreign Minister Ararat Mirzoyan met with Josep Borrell and other high-level EU officials in Brussels, where they discussed settling the Karabakh conflict and strengthening Armenia-EU relations.
Security Council Secretary Armen Grigoryan talked about a variety of obstacles in Karabakh negotiation efforts, including Soviet-era enclaves and the formation of a joint border delimitation commission.
Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev accused Armenia of dragging its feet on convening the border commission.
U.S. Ambassador to Armenia Lynne Tracy reiterated Washingtonโs commitment to helping Armenia and Azerbaijan reach a peace deal and encouraging democratization in Armenia.

entry.title: A birdโs eye view of Azerbaijanโs continuous incursions into Armenia

media:group.media:title: A birdโs eye view of Azerbaijanโs continuous incursions into Armenia
media:group.media:description:
On May 12, 2021, six months after the end of the Second Karabakh War, Azerbaijani forces crossed the border at several points into Armeniaโs Syunik and Gegharkunik regions. Azerbaijan has denied entering Armenian territory, but satellite images clearly show Azerbaijani positions inside Armenia, with forwarded military posts, roads and vehicles. This is CivilNetโs short report explaining the chronology of events that led to Azerbaijan occupying over 5,000 hectares of Armenian sovereign territory to this day.

entry.title: European Court rules in favor of owner of fire bombed gay friendly bar against Armenia

media:group.media:title: European Court rules in favor of owner of fire bombed gay friendly bar against Armenia
media:group.media:description:
๐Foreigners bought 140 homes in Armenia in March, according to the countryโs Statistical Committee. ๐Anti-government protests continue for the third week in Yerevan. ๐The European Court of Human Rights has ruled against Armenia and in favour of the former co-owner of a queer-friendly bar in Yerevan that was bombed in 2012. Armine Oganezova, the co-owner, had appealed to the court, claiming that the Armenian government did not protect her from homophobicharassment campaigns or investigate the incident properly.

ีีถีคีฏีกีฏีกีถ ีจีถีฏีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีจ ีทีกีฐีกีฃึีฃีผีพีกีฎ ีฅีถ ยซีีตีธึีฝีซีฝ-ีฐีกึีกีพยป ีณีกีถีกีบีกึีฐีซ ีฏีกีผีธึึีดีกีดีขโค ีกีตีค ีดีกีฝีซีถ ีกีฝีธึีด ีง ีกึีฟีกึีซีถ ีฃีธึีฎีฅึีซ ีถีกีญีกึีกึีซ ีฟีฅีฒีกีฏีกีฌ ีีถีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีีกึีกึีตีกีถีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิฑึีทีกีฌีธึีตีฝ ีีฒีคีฅีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด: ีีกึีกึีตีกีถีซ ีญีธีฝึีธีพี ยซีีตีธึีฝีซีฝ-ีฐีกึีกีพยป ีฟึีกีถีฝีบีธึีฟีกีตีซีถ ีดีซีปีกีถึึีซ ีฏีกีผีธึึีดีกีถ ีฐีกึึีธึีด ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถ-ีีถีคีฏีกีฝีฟีกีถ ีฅึีฏีญีธีฝีธึีฉีตีธึีถีธึีด ีฏีก ีธึีธีทีกีฏีซ ีกีผีกีปีจีถีฉีกึ: ิฑีผีกีปีซีฏีกีตีธึีด ีกีถีฐึีกีชีฅีทีฟ ีฏีฌีซีถีซ ีฏีกีฟีกึีฅีฌีกีฃีธึีฎีฅีฌ ีซึีกีพีกีบีกีตีดีกีถีกีฃึีกีตีซีถ ีคีกีทีฟีจ, ีกีฝีธึีด ีง ิฑิณ ีถีกีญีกึีกึีซ ีฟีฅีฒีกีฏีกีฌีจึ

media:group.media:description:
ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีกึีฟีกึีซีถ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีขีธีพีกีถีคีกีฏีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีนีธึีถีซ: ีีกีฟีฏีกีบีฅีฝ ีีกึีกีขีกีฒีตีกีถ ีฐีกีฏีกีดีกึีฟีธึีฉีตีกีถ, ีฐีกีต-ีฉีธึึึีกีฏีกีถ ีฐีกึีกีขีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีฏีกึีฃีกีพีธึีดีกีถ ีฃีธึีฎีจีถีฉีกึีธึีด ีฐีกีตีฏีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีธีฒีดีซ ีทีกีฐีฅึีจ ีฐีฝีฟีกีฏ ีฑึีกีฏีฅึีบีพีกีฎ ีนีฅีถ: ิฑีตีฝ ีดีกีฝีซีถ ีกีฝีธึีด ีง ึีกีฒีกึีกีฃีซีฟีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีคีธีฏีฟีธึ, ีพีกึีนีกีบีฅีฟีซ ีถีกีญีฏีซีถ ีฃีฌีญีกีพีธึ ีญีธึีฐึีคีกีฏีกีถ ึ ีถีกีญีฏีซีถ ีคีซีพีกีถีกีฃีฅีฟ ิฑึีฝีฅีถ ิณีกีฝีบีกึีตีกีถีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิฑึีทีกีฌีธึีตีฝ ีีฒีคีฅีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด: ีีก ีฏีกึีฎีธึีด ีง, ีธึ ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีขีกีถีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีธึีด ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ ีฐีฝีฟีกีฏ ีบีฅีฟึ ีง ีคีถีซ ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีซ ีฏีกีฆีดีซึ ีคีธึึีฝ ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีฏีกึีฃีกีพีซีณีกีฏีซ ีฐีกึึีจ:
